title: Silca Australia Warehouse Now Open
content:
A big goal over the last few years at Silca has been getting the brand’s innovative products to the people who want them across the globe. With shipping costs rising, even getting some of its small products to other countries has been challenging. Today the brand just announced the opening of its Australian (Brisbane) Warehouse. This gives us the ability to drastically reduce shipping timelines and cost.

Most of the brand’s catalog is already in stock, including AUS Plug Silca Ultimate Chain Waxing Systems…

The post Silca Australia Warehouse Now Open appeared first on The Radavist.
author: John Watson
